data.message: i thought you were someone else I fucking so disappointed in you EM not gonna matter your rich just know TuPac would hate you he would never did a song with you he was too conscious you were too trash i think i know how you got to be so amazing in such a short time because that the only thing i can say make sense ur a racist lil bitch who cant beat me in a fist fight ur work is funny comical imaginary bs that rhymes well ur over rated as fuck hip hop is not about killing ur moms to lullaby tunes ur a poet ur a rhymer u my dear are not hip hop ur just a rapper and not even the best white folk want u to be cause u white like them u can never be because ur not saying shit worth saying thats hip hop u go in the trash with young thug another rapper who got on see how whack he is ur worst fuck ur vocabulary and fuck how u make words rhyme ur trash with out them demons be urself in hell stop fronting u know what u facing Benzino was right all this time and i cracked on Ben for u
